SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT062
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message lists the cut-off times applied to SWIFT messages in each country/region requested. The cutoff times are stated in the requestor's local time. It is the response to an MT 042 Cut-off Times List Request.
Note: If no cut-off time is specified for the country, the list will show 0000 local time. From: GPA To: User

SystemField.Name: section-number
SystemField.description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001,to identify the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: section-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Sequential section number, beginning with 0001, to identify the position of an individual message in a multiple-section message.

SystemField.Name: total-sections
SystemField.description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: total-sections
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Total number of sections in a multi-section message.

SystemField.Name: cut-off-time
SystemField.description: Region and time. Repeated once for each cut-off region that is requested.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: cut-off-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Region and time. Repeated once for each cut-off region that is requested.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Time '" + $value + "'. time should be in the format HHmm."
